```css
// Property: lineBreakMode
// Description: The mode that should be used to break lines in the receiver.
// Component(s): ParagraphAttribute
'.line-break-mode-attribute-by-word-wrapping': { lineBreakMode: Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_WORD_WRAPPING }
'.line-break-mode-attribute-by-char-wrapping': { lineBreakMode: Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_CHAR_WRAPPING }
'.line-break-mode-attribute-by-clipping': { lineBreakMode: Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_CLIPPING }
'.line-break-mode-attribute-by-truncating-head': { lineBreakMode: Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_TRUNCATING_HEAD }
'.line-break-mode-attribute-by-truncating-middle': { lineBreakMode: Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_TRUNCATING_MIDDLE }
'.line-break-mode-attribute-by-truncating-tail': { lineBreakMode: Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_TRUNCATING_TAIL }
```
